periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe and produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy. High near 77, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 13 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 10pm. Some of the storms could be severe and produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 41, with temperatures rising to around 45 overnight. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Monday Night
